message.content: No, the authors do not include the full text of instructions given to participants or screenshots in the provided section. They do mention their data collection process and consent from respondents, but the specific instructions and any possible screenshots are not present in the provided section. They may be available in Appendix A, which is not included here.

No, the authors did not include the full text of instructions given to participants and screenshots in the provided section. They only briefly described the data collection process and mentioned that they have detailed the data collection process in Appendix A.

No, the authors do not include the full text of instructions given to participants or screenshots in the provided section. They do mention that more details about the data collection process and recruitment are available in Appendix A, but this text is not provided within the given section.
